i1.name: Clean_Cuts
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[Champion ability|ability]], '''Xayah's''' next 3 [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-attack}} fire feathers at greater velocity which penetrate through all enemies along their path and in a line past their primary target, dealing the {{as|attack's damage}} to the primary target and {{as|{{pp|key=%|30 to 50 for 3|1 to 13}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to secondary targets, the secondary damage also {{tip|critical strike|critically striking}} if the attack does. At the end of their path, a {{as|Feather|buzzword}} will be left on the ground for 6 seconds.
'''Xayah''' can store up to 5 empowered attacks for 8 seconds, refreshed with further ability use or upon attacking structures.

{{sbc|Lover's Leap:}} If either '''Xayah''' or {{ci|Rakan}} is channeling {{si|Recall}}, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. '''Both''' reach base at the time of which the initiator's {{si|Recall}} completes.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: After casting an Champion ability, Xayah's next 3 basic attacks on-attack fire feathers at greater velocity which penetrate through all enemies along their path and in a line past their primary target, dealing the attack's damage to the primary target and 1 to 13 ‒ undefined AD physical damage to secondary targets, the secondary damage also critically striking if the attack does. At the end of their path, a Feather will be left on the ground for 6 seconds.
Xayah can store up to 5 empowered attacks for 8 seconds, refreshed with further ability use or upon attacking structures.
Lover's Leap: If either Xayah or Rakan is channeling Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's Recall completes.
i1.notes:
* {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} will stop upon being intercepted by {{tip|projectile|projectile-blocking}} effects.
** {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|homing projectile destruction|Missile popping}} before and after striking the primary target.
* After striking their target, the attack will proceed in a line in the same direction it was already flying.
** If the target is more than 1000 units from '''Xayah''' when the empowered attack hits them, the attack will not keep flying in a line and drop the {{as|Feather|buzzword}} at their location immediately.
** Unlike similar effects, the homing and line trajectories use the same missile.
* All her {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} on the ground will be destoyed when '''Xayah''' {{tip|death|dies}}, and while she is dead, missiles that are still in flight will not spawn new ones, either.
* ''Clean Cut's'' feathers will spawn even if the basic attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* ''Clean Cut's'' hit can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} by or {{tip|blind|missed}} against the primary target. 
** This will not prevent the missile from continuing on its path nor from dealing damage to secondary targets. The damage cannot be dodged as or missed against a secondary target.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.
** The duration will be refreshed when starting the attack windup against them.

q1.name: Double_Daggers
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' throws two feather-blades from her left and right in the target direction in quick succession, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within their path and each leaving a {{as|Feather|buzzword}} on the ground.
Targets hit after the first take 50% damage.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xayah throws two feather-blades from her left and right in the target direction in quick succession, dealing physical damage to all enemies within their path and each leaving a Feather on the ground.
Targets hit after the first take 50% damage.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Blade|{{ap|45 to 105}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Total Damage|{{ap|45*2 to 105*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Damage Per Blade|{{ap|45/2 to 105/2}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minimum Total Damage|{{ap|45 to 105}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Because of the usual tick intervals of the server, ''Double Daggers' ''minimum cast time is typically reached at {{as|{{fd|168.58}}% '''bonus''' attack speed}} already, for a cast time of {{fd|0.132}} seconds (from the default {{rutngt|0.25}}), or the duration of 4 game ticks.
** If the first 3 game ticks happen to be slightly longer than normal, the minimum cast time of {{fd|0.1}} seconds can actually be reached in very rare cases because of that.
* '''Xayah''' is unable to declare basic attacks for a set duration during the cast time of ''Double Daggers''. The lock out duration is reduced by {{ft|{{fd|0.007}} seconds per every {{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}|1 second per every {{as|140% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
* The {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} will stop upon being intercepted by {{tip|projectile|projectile-blocking}} effects.
* As the feathers are forming, they will deal damage in a small area around '''Xayah's''' before firing.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block a single instance of damage.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Damage Per Blade: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Total Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)

• Minimum Damage Per Blade: (+ 25% bonus AD)
  • Minimum Total Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)

w1.name: Deadly_Plumage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' creates a storm of blades for 4 seconds that grants her {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and causes her basic attacks to strike the target an additional time for 20% damage.
If ''Deadly Plumage'' strikes an enemy {{tip|champion}}, '''Xayah''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

''If {{ci|Rakan}} is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage, while also gaining the
{{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when '''Xayah''' strikes an enemy champion.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xayah creates a storm of blades for 4 seconds that grants her bonus attack speed and causes her basic attacks to strike the target an additional time for 20% damage.
If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains 30% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage, while also gaining the
bonus movement speed when Xayah strikes an enemy champion.
w1.notes:
* The lesser bolts count as additional sources of single target physical damage, and will apply bonus stacks of {{ii|The Black Cleaver}} and {{ri|Electrocute}}.<!--Needs to be reconfirmed, seems to be fixed-->
* The lesser bolts from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} will also deal 20% increased damage, which is represented with additional lesser bolts. The damage dealt by ''Deadly Plumage's'' bolts is 20% of the fired bolt from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}, ''not'' of the initial basic attack.
* The lesser bolts deal 20% of the triggering basic attack's damage, not based on her {{sti|{{as|attack damage}}}}. Thus, if the basic attack is a {{tip|critical strike}}, the lesser bolt will also deal increased damage.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[ward]]s.

e1.name: Bladecaller
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' calls all {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} back to her, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies they pass through, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 75 for 11|0 to 100|formula=0.75 × critical strike chance}}|critical chance}}. {{tip|Minion|Minions}} take 50% damage. ''Bladecaller'' can only hit enemies once per {{as|Feather|buzzword}}.
Enemies take {{pp|type=previous feathers hit|key=%|100 to 10 by 5|x-1|formula=100%-(5% per previous feather hit). ''This is capped at 10% damage.''}} damage from a {{as|Feather|buzzword}}.
Enemies hit by at least 3 {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing physical damage to enemies they pass through, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined. Minions take 50% damage. Bladecaller can only hit enemies once per Feather.
Enemies take x-1 ‒ undefined damage from a Feather.
Enemies hit by at least 3 Feathers are rooted for 1.25 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Feather|{{ap|55 to 95}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion Damage Per Feather|{{ap|55/2 to 95/2}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.notes:
* {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} that are 'in flight' will be called to '''Xayah''' too, but only once they've landed normally first.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block a single instance of damage.
* This ability cannot be ranked at [[Experience (champion)|Level]] 1.
* The damage dealt by ''Bladecaller'' follows a diminishing returns formula not mentioned in the ability's description, successively reducing extra damage from feathers beyond the first.
** This formula is: 
*** For feathers <=19: Damage of one feather{{times}}(n{{minus}}{{fd|0.05}}{{times}}(n{{minus}}1){{divided by}}2{{times}}n) where n stands for the number of feathers hit.
*** For feathers >=20: Damage of one feather{{times}}(19{{minus}}{{fd|0.05}}{{times}}(19{{minus}}1){{divided by}}2{{times}}19{{plus}}0.1{{times}}(n{{minus}}19)) where n stands for the number of feathers hit.
** For example, at rank 1 ''Bladecaller'' deals {{pp|type=feathers hit|55*(x-0.05*(x-1)/2*x) for 19}}.
* ''Bladecaller'' cannot be cast without a {{as|Feather|buzzword}} on the ground.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage Per Feather: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Minion Damage Per Feather: (+ 30% bonus AD)

r1.name: Featherstorm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' leaps into the air, becoming {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|ghosted}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. At 1 second into the effect, she rains down 5 daggers in a cone in the target direction which deal {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within their path and leave behind a {{as|Feather|buzzword}} each.
'''Xayah''' is unable to basic attack and cast her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Featherstorm'', but she can still move.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable and ghosted for 1.5 seconds. At 1 second into the effect, she rains down 5 daggers in a cone in the target direction which deal physical damage to enemies within their path and leave behind a Feather each.
Xayah is unable to basic attack and cast her champion ability during Featherstorm, but she can still move.
r1.notes:
* The {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} will land on the ground upon being intercepted by {{tip|projectile|projectile-blocking}} effects.
* The individual missiles have 1100 range but start slightly behind Xayah, reducing their total range.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Xayah''' is in ''Featherstorm'':
{{ct|attack=false|move=true|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true|interrupts=death}}
